U: S. Rep. Lloyd Doggett, a Democrat representing Central Texas, shared a tweet highlighting the impact of the virus in Hays County, stating that there has been an "incredible 845% increase in cases since June 7."
Hays County: located to the south of Austin, has reported more active cases than Austin's Travis County, despite having a significantly smaller population.
Hays County officials confirmed the incr: 19 cases and attributed it to activities such as working at or going to restaurants and bars, floating the river, and attending large public gatherings.
The demographic group with the largest i: 19 cases in Hays County since early June is 20 to 29-year-olds in San Marcos, whereas in April and May, the majority of new cases were primarily among people older than 30 who were Hispanic in Kyle.
